Special Recruitment Frontier Research on Embodied AI (å ·èº«æºè½) Frameworks for Robotics Applications: Joint research projects with a group of experts in Embodied AI from both industry and top-tier universities. Our research focuses on the following areas: Advancing Vision-Language Models (VLMs) for embodied AI tasks. Diffusion policies for delicate operations. Topics related to visual-language navigation. Building interactive AI agents, including low-latency voice assistants, MCP, memory, and proactive and personalized agents. Pioneering the next-generation Vision-Language-Action (VLA) paradigm for embodied AI. We seek highly motivated students passionate about shaping the future of embodied agents to improve the lives of thousands of families. Available positions include PhD, MPhil, RAs, and Interns.
